description: Detail oriented software engineer with 5+ years of professional experience developing custom websites, apps and video games.
Motivated developer who enjoys creating responsive, easy to use full stack applications.
Posseses a track record of developing a project management tool used by 200+ employees, a data centre documentation tool, as well as a virtual reality game published on Steam.
Enjoy contributing to open source projects that I have a passion for.

items.name: Music Box
items.description: A simple way to listen to music at home or on the go. Fully responsive design makes it easy to use on mobile.

items.name: UE4.14 Contribution

items.name: GoalieVR
items.description: Experience the adrenaline rush of defending your goal against 5 opposing players, an unrealistic but FUN experience. Play against AI or your friends (requires a compatible iOS or Android mobile device).

items.name: Quasar
items.description: A competitive, multiplayer, top down space shooter with a retro feel.

items.title: Software Developer (Contractor)
description: Contracted by Apotex Inc. to assist develop a web application that is used to manage their data centers, network cabling, work orders, inventory and more. Built with VB, ASP.NET and MS SQL Server.

Contracted by Apotex Inc. to consult and create software that is used for managing capital engineering projects, financial forecasting and fiscal year budgeting. Consolidated information from SAP, an existing custom CMS, and multiple excel sheets into a properly structured SQL database through automatic daily imports. Developed using React-Redux, IIS, Node.js, Express and MS SQL Server. Created custom reports using Qlik Sense.

items.title: Executive Vice President
description: In charge of conducting interviews and hiring employees.
Implemented agile development practices consisting of weekly sprints.
Managed interpersonal relationships within the office.
Designer and lead virtual reality gameplay developer of GoalieVR, an interactive VR game that places you in NHL goalie pads and invites friends to take shots on their mobile devices.

items.title: Software Engineer
description: Started as an intern and solidified my position as a core team member.
One of two lead developers on Quasar, a competitive, multiplayer, top down space shooter with a retro feel.
Promoted with OSnap! Games at conventions in Seattle, Boston, Texas, and Washington as a lead developer.
